org.epzilla.leader.message
Class RejectReason

java.lang.Object
  org.epzilla.leader.message.RejectReason

public class RejectReason
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to define the reasons for the message 6-NOT ACCEPTED HERE. Reply Code from this class will be attached with the Type 6 reply to get the requester to identify the rejected reason.

Author:
Harshana Eranga Martin mailto: harshana05@gmail.com
